attributes.action: Make All Party Manifesto Commitments Legally Binding
attributes.additional_details:
1. All manifesto commitments should be considered legally binding - and if the leader of a party deviates from these policies they should be held in contempt and personally subject to legal ramifications such as appropriate jail term. A new party leader should then be selected by a voting majority of Party Members

Making this policy law will mean that any and all future governments will be forced to up hold democracy by law and be forced to stand by the policies they were elected on.
attributes.background: This is a Petition to make All Party Manifesto Commitments legally binding - and the Prime Minister personally accountable for any actions that deviate from the manifesto policies in which they were elected on.
